translations.translation: and guarded it against every defiant shaytan.
Protecting them against every wayward devil,
and have protected it from every rebellious satan.
to protect them from the rebellious satan.
And to protect it from every rebellious devil.
And to guard against every rebellious Shaytan.
And (there is) a safeguard against every rebellious Shaitan.
and to preserve against every rebel Satan;
With security from every froward devil.
and guarded it against all rebellious devils:
And have placed therein a guard against any Satan froward.
and to guard from any froward devil.
(For beauty) and for guard against all obstinate rebellious evil spirits,
And to guard against every rebellious devil.
a protection against every rebel satan;
And guarded it against every defiant devil.
And as protection against every rebellious devil

[37:7] and to guard (wa-hifzan is in the accusative because of an implied verb) that is to say, ‘We have guarded it with meteors’, from every (min kulli is semantically connected to the implied verb) any rebellious devil, who is a transgressor, in rebellion against obedience.
(With security) He says: they are made safe (from every froward devil) from every tough, rebellious devil.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَحِفْظاً مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَّارِدٍ } معناه متمردٌ عاتٍ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } جعلناها { وَحِفْظاً } أي: بعدما زينا السماء بها صيرناها صائنة حفظاً لها { مِّن } وصول { كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَّارِدٍ } [الصافات: 7] خراج عن إطاعة الله، مائل عن توحيده إياها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وحِفْظاً } من الشياطين، كما قال:

[الملك: 5] أو: بإضمار فعله، أي: حفظناها حفظاً { من كل شيطانٍ ماردٍ } خارج عن الطاعة، فيُرمي بالشهب
